full_text: Is this the same thibs that said before he got hired that he’s changed and opened minded? This sounds like a pr stunt. Thibs is sending Berman to every Knicks podcast to get his message out https://t.co/phl0oicxw1
Letter from Knicks president Leon Rose to season ticket holders (via Fred Katz, The Athletic): https://t.co/Mk2S9IXkIq

For me, becoming isn’t about arriving somewhere or achieving a certain aim. 

I see it instead as forward motion, a means of evolving, 

a way to reach continuously toward a better self. 

The journey doesn’t end.

#sustainability 
#Embrace https://t.co/yiZPyyHSD4
